<div data-page="{"component":"ycdc_new/pages/Companies/ShowPage","props":{"currentUser":null,"company":{"id":29069,"slug":"happyrobot","name":"Happyrobot","batch_name":"S23","small_logo_url":"https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/e6bc9a898b365c0f976d54b44c58d8a05ebfd7af.png","one_liner":"AI agents to automate phone calls in the logistics industry","website":"https://happyrobot.ai","long_description":"Happyrobot's voice AI agents automate inbound and outbound phone calls in the logistics industry.

Freight brokers, 3PLs, carriers and other enterprises connect their information systems to our AI agents to handle check calls, load updates, payment status, appointment scheduling or even sales Francisco","city_tag":"san-francisco-bay-area","country":"US","linkedin_url":"https://www.linkedin.com/company/happyrobot/","twitter_url":"https://twitter.com/happyrobot_ai","fb_url":"","cb_url":"https://www.crunchbase.com/organization/happyrobot","github_url":"https://github.com/happyrobot-labs","free_response_question_answers":[{"id":"1","answer":"Pablo (CEO) and Javi (COO) are siblings. Luis (CTO) met Pablo on their second day of their Robotics and Electronics undergraduate program. Later, they both pursued a Masters in Mechanical Engineering at the Technical University of Munich (TUM). It was also at TUM where Pablo pursued his PhD in Computer Vision at one of the top 3D AI Labs in the world.","question":"How did your company get started? (i.e., How did the founders meet? How did you come up with the idea? How did you decide to be a founder?)"},{"id":"2","answer":"","question":"How did you decide to apply to Y Combinator? What was your experience applying, going through the batch, and fundraising at demo day?"},{"id":"3","answer":"","question":"How have you kept in touch with the YC community and continued to use YC resources & programs since the batch ended?"},{"id":"4","answer":"","question":"What's the history of your company from getting started until the present day? What were the big inflection points?"},{"id":"5","answer":"","question":"What is the core problem you are solving? Why is this a big problem? What made you decide to work on it?"},{"id":"6","answer":"","question":"What is your long-term vision?
